item.content:encoded:
Reviewing visualing data with R with this exmaple project。

Import libraries

library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

Import data

From csv to dataset

Read datasets/confirmed_cases_worldwide.csv into confirmed_cases_worldwide

Select/filter data

# Filter for China, from Feb 15

china_after_feb15 <- confirmed_cases_china_vs_world %>%
  filter(is_china == "China", date >= "2020-02-15")

Plot

One line

# Draw a line plot of cumulative cases vs. date
# Label the y-axis

ggplot(confirmed_cases_worldwide, aes(date, cum_cases)) +
  geom_line() +
  ylab("Cumulative confirmed cases")

Multiple lines

# Using confirmed_cases_top7_outside_china, draw a line plot of
# cum_cases vs. date, colored by country

ggplot(confirmed_cases_top7_outside_china, aes(date, cum_cases, color = country)) +
  geom_line() +
  ylab("Cumulative confirmed cases")

Scale

# Modify the plot to use a logarithmic scale on the y-axis

plt_not_china_trend_lin +
  scale_y_log10()

`geom_smooth()` using formula 'y ~ x'

2022-09-21 Started blogging via Ghost on yunyi-tang.ghost.io.

2022-09-26 Brought domain yunyitang.me from Google Domain, and link yunyi-tang.ghost.io to yunyitang.me.

2023-11-1 The subscription from Ghost ended and yunyi-tang.ghost.io deactivated.

2023-11-7 Migrated personal blog to Github Pages（yunyit.github.io）and disconnected the domain yunyitang.me from yunyi-tang.ghost.io.

2023-11-9 Rebuilt blog via Hugo and PaperMod with both English blogging and Chinese blogging.

2023-12-19 Started building the twikoo commenting system for the blog.

2023-12-20 Built the twikoo commenting system via MongoDB and Vercel, and posted the first comment on yunyitang.me.

2024-01-05 Initiated the Tags page and added an entry of it in the header.

2024-01-06 Improved SEO with Google Search Console and Bing Webmaster Tools; ongoing SEO improvement with Baidu.

2024-01-07 Secured GitHub Pages site with HTTPS.

2024-01-10 Added umami website analytics dashboard to footer.
